overview.en: Known as the “Gene Crystal”, UCG is used by all planets in the METASENS universe. Players can get it through in-game competitions, community activities, and so on. UCG tokens will be consumed if the player wishes to reproduce or replicate colonial organisms.
overview.zh: UCG被稱為“基因水晶”，在METASENS宇宙中被所有行星使用。玩家可以通過遊戲內競賽、社區活動等方式獲得。如果玩家希望複製殖民生物體，則將消耗 UCG 代幣。
